messages.subject: Re: Young writers contest, ages 6-18
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Laurie. I think my 8 year old would like to enter. She really enjoys writing stories. ~ Joanne ~ Mom to Jacqueline (8), Shawna (11) & Cimion (14)
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Laurie. I think my 8 year old would like to enter. She really
enjoys writing stories.

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (8), Shawna (11) & Cimion (14)
http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com/



--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, "Laurie"
<unschoolingblogger@...> wrote:
>

> children's writing contest. Thought I'd pass along the info for any
> budding authors in our group. :)
>
> Ages 6-18 - can be prose, poetry, etc. See link for details. Entries
> due April 1st.
> http://www.threeleggeddragon.com/tabatha/keyhole%20contest.htm

> Laurie

messages.subject: Young writers contest, ages 6-18
messages.msgSnippet: There s a children s book author, Tabitha Yeatts, who is doing a young children s writing contest. Thought I d pass along the info for any budding authors in
messages.messageBody:
There's a children's book author, Tabitha Yeatts, who is doing a young
children's writing contest. Thought I'd pass along the info for any
budding authors in our group. :)

Ages 6-18 - can be prose, poetry, etc. See link for details. Entries
due April 1st.
http://www.threeleggeddragon.com/tabatha/keyhole%20contest.htm

Laurie
